title: Town ravaged by wildfire after enduring Canada’s all-time hottest temps
content:
1. Town ravaged by wildfire after enduring Canada’s all-time hottest temps  Fox News
  2. ‘Lytton is gone’: Accounts of death, destruction in Canadian village that caught fire in record heat  The Washington Post
  3. Canada's destructive firestorms, explained  Popular Science
  4. Campers also forced to evacuate outside of Lytton, B.C., due to massive fire  CTV News Vancouver
  5. Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カナダ史上最高の気温を記録した町が山火事に見舞われる
经历了加拿大历史上最热的温度后，小镇被野火蹂躏
經歷了加拿大歷史上最熱的溫度後，小鎮被野火蹂躪
